channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In France, debate heats up over air conditioning
item.description: The politics of air conditioning in France, as the country basks in yet another heatwave.

item.title: President Trump’s Talks with the Leaders of Russia and Ukraine
item.description: President Trump, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and seven European leaders met at the White House to talk about ending the war between Russia...

item.title: Hurricane Erin update: Forecast sees huge storm moving closer to U.S.
item.description: Forecasts nudge Erin's likely path to the west, increasing the risks at U.S. beaches. Experts say the storm's massive size, rather than its windspeeds...

item.title: Too much to pack, not enough hugs: A Kenyan man's last 48 hours in America
item.description: Samuel Kangethe has lived in the U.S. for nearly two decades, but an unresolved immigration case has made him deportable. He's decided to return to Ke...

item.title: Home Depot keeps quiet on immigration raids outside its doors
item.description: The home-improvement chain is now one of the companies most caught up in Trump's immigration crackdown. The retailer's history with day laborers is lo...

item.title: 'The danger is not over in Pakistan' after flash floods
item.description: Emergency teams searching for the missing are struggling through mud and debris, following flash flooding in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province.

item.title: Investigation into 'horrifying' death of French streamer
item.description: Raphaël Graven, also known as Jeanpormanove, was found dead at a residence in Contes, a village north of Nice, prosecutors said.

item.title: 7/15: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi faces questions about handling of the Epstein files; Historic Washington, D.C., restaurant closing doors for renovations

item.title: Meet the woman making move-in day at Widener University feel like home
item.description: At Widener University, "Move-In Day" is more than just hauling boxes; it's a moment when students and families begin to feel they belong.

item.title: Kremlin plays down Zelensky talks as Trump warns Putin may not 'want to make deal'
item.description: The US president conceded the war in Ukraine was "tough to solve" after several days of high-level talks.

item.title: Two summits later, Trump still faces tough obstacles in quest for peace in Ukraine
item.description: Meetings in Alaska and Washington were high on pomp and low on breakthroughs, but there were two potentially significant developments.

item.title: Israel demands release of all Gaza hostages, casting doubt on ceasefire proposal
item.description: It comes a day after Hamas said it accepted a proposal for a 60-day truce, during which around half of the 50 hostages would be freed.

item.title: David Allvin, top Air Force general, to retire early

item.title: Trump considering buying government stake in Intel, Lutnick confirms
item.description: Intel was under the Wall Street spotlight Tuesday as shares popped nearly 7% on news that the struggling chip maker secured a $2 billion investment fr...

item.title: Trump’s Justice Department is investigating whether DC police officials falsified crime data
